definitions.text: the trait of lacking restraint or control; reckless freedom from inhibition or worry
a feeling of extreme emotional intensity

examples: We abandoned the old car in the empty parking lot

definitions.text: give up with the intent of never claiming again
examples: She gave up her children to her ex-husband when she moved to Tahiti
We gave the drowning victim up for dead

definitions.text: leave behind empty; move out of
examples: You must vacate your office by tonight

definitions.text: stop maintaining or insisting on; of ideas or claims
examples: He abandoned the thought of asking for her hand in marriage
Both sides have to give up some claims in these negotiations

definitions.text: leave someone who needs or counts on you; leave in the lurch
